name: The Vacciner
description:
This game was made for the Quarantine Jam 2021, so it still in under development.

This is a global pandemic inspired game, where you are a brave doctor who has to avoid the evil virus by jumping and sliding in a laboratory.

The goal of the game is to reach the vaccine before the virus takes you! 

COMMANDSSpace -> To JumpShift -> To Slide

The .pck file is needed for all the three versions to be able to play the game.

If you have any questions or advice you can write them in the comment section
